document.title: Solar cell (Extract)
document.citation: Simple English Wikipedia: “Solar cell”. Retrieved from https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solar_cell on 20 Aug 2015.
document.body: The second generation of photovoltaic materials is based on the use of thin-film deposits of semiconductors. These devices were initially designed to be high-efficiency, multiple junction photovoltaic cells. Later, the advantage of using a thin-film of material was noted, reducing the mass of material required for cell design.
